Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Raymond Ruckel
Summary: Grants retroactive tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Raymond Ruckel.
